title: Hero MotoCorp faces tax probe over links to vendor
description: India's Directorate General of Goods and Services Tax Intelligence is investigating motorcycle manufacturer Hero MotoCorp over its connection with vendor Salt Experiences, suspected of false expenditure reporting of around Rs 900 million ($10.87m).
